subject: It must be located very close to the odometer and it has an USB plug that can be attached to any PC.
body:
(The entry is at the bottom of that page. Some 
farmers didn't even bother to plant their crops in the dust. One of the best quotes 
from it is: "When a car can't accomodate a dirty dog or a wet, sandy kid then the 
car owns you not the other way around.
